github-events-monitor-agent.description: GitHub Events Monitor MCP Server for AI agents - provides trending repositories and MCP development insights

get_event_counts.description: Get the total number of events grouped by event type for a given time offset

offset_minutes.description: Number of minutes to look back (must be positive)

get_event_counts.example: get_event_counts(60) - Get events from last hour

get_avg_pr_interval.description: Calculate the average time between pull request events for a given repository
get_avg_pr_interval.example: get_avg_pr_interval('modelcontextprotocol/servers') - Get PR frequency for MCP servers repo

get_repository_activity.description: Get detailed activity summary for a specific repository

hours.description: Number of hours to look back (default: 24)

get_trending_repositories.description: Get most active repositories by event count

hours.description: Number of hours to look back (default: 24)

limit.description: Maximum number of repositories to return (default: 10)

get_trending_repositories.example: get_trending_repositories(24, 20) - Get top 20 trending repos in last 24 hours

collect_events_now.description: Manually trigger immediate collection of events from GitHub API

limit.description: Maximum number of events to collect (None for all available)

agentInstructions.purpose: Provide up-to-date information regarding latest research and development effort in Model Context Protocol most trending repositories
analysisTasks: Monitor trending repositories in MCP ecosystem
Track PR frequency and development velocity
Identify emerging MCP tools and servers
Report on latest MCP development trends

exampleQueries.trending_mcp_repos: get_trending_repositories(168, 10) - Get top 10 trending repos in last week
